comment: The friendship condition, alternatively expressed by neighborhoods: in a friendship graph, the neighborhoods of two different vertices have exactly one vertex in common. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Dec-2017.) (Revised by AV, 29-Mar-2021.) (Proof shortened by AV, 30-Dec-2021.)
